fields.description: Description of a calendar event is exposed by Ti.Calendar.Event.description property on android and Ti.Calendar.Event.notes property in iOS. Since the purpose is same, it is nice to have common property name to support cross platform code.
fields.summary: Ti.Calendar.Event - Maintain the same properties on both iOS and Android
